p: Meat is a daily part of the internationally human diet. It contains proteins (with all the essential amino acids), vitamins (A, B12, B6, D, and E), and minerals (iron and zinc), which are very important to human growth and well-being. 1 Because of its nutrient content, meat is a highly perishable food since it represents good media for microorganism proliferation. 1, 2 According to the World Health Organization, 30% of the inhabitants in industrialized countries suffer every year from foodborne diseases 3 with most of the cases attributed to the consumption of meat. 4
